title: ULAB commemorates Victory Day 2025, honors Liberation War heroes
body: ULAB reaffirmed its commitment to preserving and celebrating the legacy of the Liberation War, fostering a deep sense of patriotism among its community University of Liberal Arts Bangladesh (ULAB) celebrated Victory Day 2025 on Wednesday with a program paying tribute to the heroes of the Liberation War. The event began with the inauguration of a pictorial and book display on the Liberation War, followed by a formal program featuring a welcome speech by Prof. Jude William Genilo, acting vice chancellor of ULAB. The highlight was an inspiring talk by renowned freedom fighter Major (retd) Syed Munibur Rahman, who shared his Liberation War experiences and reflected on the nation’s achievements in freedom. The program concluded with soul-stirring Victory Day songs honoring the sacrifices made for Bangladesh’s independence. ULAB reaffirmed its commitment to preserving and celebrating the legacy of the Liberation War, fostering a deep sense of patriotism among its community.
